channel.title: Server Question
channel.description:
Hello, I understand fully of my rights here on the forums. If I am posting in the wrong section then I do apologize. And I will learn from my past Errors. Please Do Not Flame me, I quitted Private servers for around 1 year. I forgot everything.. I remember their was a Server advertisement Thread but I see Mopar has gotten fed up with the bumps.
----
Where can I get a starter Server Source...? I would like to start a Server again. And host one.. And make some forums.. ect. So if you can help out then I would appreciate this very much.
----
Again I am very sorry if I posted in the wrong section or if this is Noted as Spam. Moderator please Move it if it is in the wrong section. Thank you.

item.dc:creator: @ZyxelSanta ZyxelSanta
item.description:
@ZyxelSanta wrote:

Have some common sense, And read the Stickies YOU DO NOT NEED TO VIRUS SCAN SERVERS
